page.title: 12STEWARTBY: CHILDRENS VIEWS
page.content: Written by David Horn Aged 14 Once you have got up there are a number of things you can do. Young children go to the parks. One of the parks is very old and is falling apart, but the other park is much newer and is therefore in good condition. The seven to eleven _ year _ olds ride around Stewartby on their bicycles. Most of them have BMX's (A popular leisure bike for children) The other, older age group mainly have motorbikes and they take them over to the fields behind the main village where they enjoy cross country motor races. If you have not got a motorbike or bicycle you can go to the village shop and hire a video to watch on the television. If you have no video your life in Stewartby can be very boring.
